item.description:
When:
Thursday, July 26, 2007, 7:00 PM
Where:
AMC Loews Boston Commons 19
175 tremont street
boston , MA 02111
617-423-3499 movie theatre #

Plot Summary:

The name of the next movie is "Superbad." It's about two co-dependent high school seniors (Hill and Cera) who are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry. It's supposed to be really funny. People who have seen it said the funniest parts weren't in the previews, so I suggest you guys watch the trailer, and see what you think.


Cast: Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, and Seth Rogen.

Official Website: http://www.sonypictur...

RSVP to: advanced.screening@gmail.com
item.name: Superbad
